channel.title: Working on a matrix project
channel.description:
Yeah yeah, i'm sure 1,000 people ask etc etc, but i've been struggling to figure out to change the log-in BG client, i've stripped it from the loading screen but can't seem to fix the problem in the cache for when it's fully loaded. I'm actually willing to pay someone if they can assist me. (Assistance first too many assholes on here.) I know you guys want to complain about how i'm a leecher or something of the sort, i ask that you kindly don't I just need some minor assistance; And yes i have all the sprite editors and cache editors.
Thanks in advance

item.title: Working on a matrix project
item.dc:creator: @Savions_Sw Savions Sw
item.description:
@Savions_Sw wrote:

If you cant fix that, then i wont help you.

Its so easy, you dumb leecher.

But ok, i give you 1 hint:

Dragonkk
